TEXT.English: You can check the parameters influencing your stability in the Financial Advisor
TEXT.Chinese: You can check the parameters influencing your stability in the Financial Advisor

TEXT.English: Discovering Microbiology will keep you safe from plagues
TEXT.Chinese: Discovering Microbiology will keep you safe from plagues

TEXT.English: Not every lake produces 2 food. Some are salt lakes, and thus produce 1 food, like coast.
TEXT.Chinese: Not every lake produces 2 food. Some are salt lakes, and thus produce 1 food, like coast.

TEXT.English: If you get a skull over your cities, it means they have the plague! The population and units in the city and in the surrounding region will probably decrease dramatically. To reduce the effects and the duration of plague, keep your cities healthy.
TEXT.Chinese: If you get a skull over your cities, it means they have the plague! The population and units in the city and in the surrounding region will probably decrease dramatically. To reduce the effects and the duration of plague, keep your cities healthy.

TEXT.English: Plague can spread in many ways - through trade routes, along roads and between neighbouring cities.
TEXT.Chinese: Plague can spread in many ways - through trade routes, along roads and between neighbouring cities.

TEXT.English: The civilization you choose to play affects your difficulty every bit as much as the difficulty level you choose. Make sure to pick a civ that suits your playing style and your level of expertise.
TEXT.Chinese: The civilization you choose to play affects your difficulty every bit as much as the difficulty level you choose. Make sure to pick a civ that suits your playing style and your level of expertise.

TEXT.English: Every civ has hidden modifiers that influence their growth. This way, modern civs are not disadvantaged by their late start.
TEXT.Chinese: Every civ has hidden modifiers that influence their growth. This way, modern civs are not disadvantaged by their late start.

TEXT.English: You can declare war on independent states and minor civs only by moving your units into their territory.
TEXT.Chinese: You can declare war on independent states and minor civs only by moving your units into their territory.

TEXT.English: Combining certain civics will improve or harm the stability of your empire.
TEXT.Chinese: Combining certain civics will improve or harm the stability of your empire.

TEXT.English: You can't see the current year until you discover calendar.
TEXT.Chinese: You can't see the current year until you discover calendar.

TEXT.English: Remember that you can always take control of a newborn civ if you don't like the civilization you started with. You can also use this feature to play from 3000BC even when you want to pick a civ that starts later on.
TEXT.Chinese: Remember that you can always take control of a newborn civ if you don't like the civilization you started with. You can also use this feature to play from 3000BC even when you want to pick a civ that starts later on.

TEXT.English: Combining Totalitarianism and Universal Suffrage isn't a good idea.
TEXT.Chinese: Combining Totalitarianism and Universal Suffrage isn't a good idea.

TEXT.English: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, vassals can declare war.
TEXT.Chinese: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, vassals can declare war.

TEXT.English: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, movement through ocean tiles costs ? a movement point.
TEXT.Chinese: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, movement through ocean tiles costs ? a movement point.

TEXT.English: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, the max income from a shrine is 20 gold per turn.
TEXT.Chinese: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, the max income from a shrine is 20 gold per turn.

TEXT.English: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, the Colosseum is a world wonder. The generic building is called an "amphitheatre."
TEXT.Chinese: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, the Colosseum is a world wonder. The generic building is called an "amphitheatre."

TEXT.English: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, vassal states are enabled by the discovery of monarchy.
TEXT.Chinese: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, vassal states are enabled by the discovery of monarchy.

TEXT.English: If you like the mod, and if you have any ideas to improve it, or you just have a bug to report, make sure to check out the development forum at CivFanatics.com.
TEXT.Chinese: If you like the mod, and if you have any ideas to improve it, or you just have a bug to report, make sure to check out the development forum at CivFanatics.com.

TEXT.English: If it's been a while since the last time you got an updated version of the mod, make sure to check CivFanatics.com for a new version. The mod is in active development, and updates are uploaded often. Every update is full of fixes and new features.
TEXT.Chinese: If it's been a while since the last time you got an updated version of the mod, make sure to check CivFanatics.com for a new version. The mod is in active development, and updates are uploaded often. Every update is full of fixes and new features.

TEXT.English: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, camera flying mode hotkey has changed to [CTRL + F]
TEXT.Chinese: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, camera flying mode hotkey has changed to [CTRL + F]

TEXT.English: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, city founding is not allowed in tundra, ice or desert if far from water.
TEXT.Chinese: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, city founding is not allowed in tundra, ice or desert if far from water.

TEXT.English: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, jungle, rainforest and marshes are impassable to most land units.
TEXT.Chinese: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, jungle, rainforest and marshes are impassable to most land units.

TEXT.English: If you attempt to stop the growth of newborn civs, some of your units will flip to their side.
TEXT.Chinese: If you attempt to stop the growth of newborn civs, some of your units will flip to their side.

TEXT.English: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, many wonder effects have been changed
TEXT.Chinese: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, many wonder effects have been changed

TEXT.English: Never attack a city with only siege weapons. They may be the best way to damage a large number of enemy units, but once they inflict their maximum amount of damage, they will be unable to attack enemy units.
TEXT.Chinese: Never attack a city with only siege weapons. They may be the best way to damage a large number of enemy units, but once they inflict their maximum amount of damage, they will be unable to attack enemy units.

TEXT.English: Good things come to spies who wait. Leaving a spy on a tile will reduce the costs of all Espionage Missions performed against objects in that tile. So leaving a Spy in an enemy city will make your Missions in that city significantly cheaper.
TEXT.Chinese: Good things come to spies who wait. Leaving a spy on a tile will reduce the costs of all Espionage Missions performed against objects in that tile. So leaving a Spy in an enemy city will make your Missions in that city significantly cheaper.

TEXT.English: If you spend more Espionage Points than an opponent, then your missions towards that opponent will be cheaper. Every point you spend throughout the game is added towards this total, so if you see a fierce rival outspending you in Espionage Points, it would be wise to increase your Espionage spending.
TEXT.Chinese: If you spend more Espionage Points than an opponent, then your missions towards that opponent will be cheaper. Every point you spend throughout the game is added towards this total, so if you see a fierce rival outspending you in Espionage Points, it would be wise to increase your Espionage spending.

TEXT.English: When on the defense, be sure to set your Fighters and Jet Fighters to the "Intercept" mission when they're not running missions. They will defend the skies from opposing Air Units, earning them valuable experience points.
TEXT.Chinese: When on the defense, be sure to set your Fighters and Jet Fighters to the "Intercept" mission when they're not running missions. They will defend the skies from opposing Air Units, earning them valuable experience points.

TEXT.English: During wartime, your ships may sever all naval trade routes entering an enemy city by using the "Blockade" Mission within range of the opposing metropolis. Using a Privateer to blockade a city during peace time will even allow you to plunder gold from your enemy's treasury!
TEXT.Chinese: During wartime, your ships may sever all naval trade routes entering an enemy city by using the "Blockade" Mission within range of the opposing metropolis. Using a Privateer to blockade a city during peace time will even allow you to plunder gold from your enemy's treasury!

TEXT.English: Intercontinental trade routes now yield more gold than normal trade routes. Build a Customs House to further cash in.
TEXT.Chinese: Intercontinental trade routes now yield more gold than normal trade routes. Build a Customs House to further cash in.

TEXT.English: Naval Units performing "Blockade" Missions prevent all enemy trade from passing within their blockading range. Making sure an enemy city is within that range is a sure-fire way to stop enemy trade routes.
TEXT.Chinese: Naval Units performing "Blockade" Missions prevent all enemy trade from passing within their blockading range. Making sure an enemy city is within that range is a sure-fire way to stop enemy trade routes.

TEXT.English: The game is won when a Spaceship arrives on Alpha Centauri, not when it is launched. The more Engines and Thrusters you build, the faster the Spaceship will arrive.
TEXT.Chinese: The game is won when a Spaceship arrives on Alpha Centauri, not when it is launched. The more Engines and Thrusters you build, the faster the Spaceship will arrive.

TEXT.English: Your Fighters can intercept multiple enemy planes per turn, but become less effective at it as they get damage, so take care to repair your defensive planes.
TEXT.Chinese: Your Fighters can intercept multiple enemy planes per turn, but become less effective at it as they get damage, so take care to repair your defensive planes.

TEXT.English: Use the Submarine's stealth along with its ability to carry conventional and tactical nuclear missiles to launch a devastating opening attack on another landmass.
TEXT.Chinese: Use the Submarine's stealth along with its ability to carry conventional and tactical nuclear missiles to launch a devastating opening attack on another landmass.

TEXT.English: Keep some spies in your borders for counter-espionage. Enemy spies can wreak havoc!
TEXT.Chinese: Keep some spies in your borders for counter-espionage. Enemy spies can wreak havoc!

TEXT.English: Short on gold? Send your spies to steal from your neighbors!
TEXT.Chinese: Short on gold? Send your spies to steal from your neighbors!

TEXT.English: Mounted units cause flanking damage to certain Siege weapons. For example, all Cannons in an enemy stack are damaged if an attacking Cavalry unit survives the battle!
TEXT.Chinese: Mounted units cause flanking damage to certain Siege weapons. For example, all Cannons in an enemy stack are damaged if an attacking Cavalry unit survives the battle!

TEXT.English: Random events are tied to what is happening within your civilization. If you want to experience all of the events that are possible, you will have to play numerous games using different approaches and strategies: war and peace, different religious approaches, different technological paths, different civics and more!
TEXT.Chinese: Random events are tied to what is happening within your civilization. If you want to experience all of the events that are possible, you will have to play numerous games using different approaches and strategies: war and peace, different religious approaches, different technological paths, different civics and more!

TEXT.English: You may be wise to keep some reserve gold in your treasury. You never know when your savings may help mitigate the effects of a disastrous event or grant you access to additional opportunities when a positive event rolls around.
TEXT.Chinese: You may be wise to keep some reserve gold in your treasury. You never know when your savings may help mitigate the effects of a disastrous event or grant you access to additional opportunities when a positive event rolls around.

TEXT.English: A negative event that afflicts one of your rivals is, in effect, like a positive event for you! Keep an eye on the world news reports in case an event happening to other nations opens new opportunities for you.
TEXT.Chinese: A negative event that afflicts one of your rivals is, in effect, like a positive event for you! Keep an eye on the world news reports in case an event happening to other nations opens new opportunities for you.

TEXT.English: Rival civilizations led by computer opponents now pose a more significant threat from the sea. Stronger fleets, amphibious invasions... Don't be caught unprepared! The more warlike leaders can be very sneaky with their attack plans, as they have learned to think beyond the sword.
TEXT.Chinese: Rival civilizations led by computer opponents now pose a more significant threat from the sea. Stronger fleets, amphibious invasions... Don't be caught unprepared! The more warlike leaders can be very sneaky with their attack plans, as they have learned to think beyond the sword.

Civ4GameText.TEXT:
TXT_KEY_HINT_DOC_1 AI Mongols receive additional armies to attack Russia and the Middle East. Be prepared!
<<<<<<< HEAD AI控制的蒙古会得到攻打俄罗斯和中东地区的额外兵力。请做好准备！ ======= AI Mongols receive additional armies to attack Russia and the Middle East. Be prepared! >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

TXT_KEY_HINT_DOC_2 In Dawn of Civilization, several civilizations like Byzantium, Italy and Thailand have conditional spawns, and don't appear in every game.
<<<<<<< HEAD 在“文明的曙光”中，像拜占庭、意大利、伊朗和泰国等文明的出现需要特定的条件，因此这些文明并不一定每场游戏都会出现。 ======= In Dawn of Civilization, several civilizations like Byzantium, Italy and Thailand have conditional spawns, and don't appear in every game. >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

TXT_KEY_HINT_DOC_3 Several AI civilizations flip larger areas on spawn to help them along.
<<<<<<< HEAD 一些文明在AI控制时出现时的归顺区域更大。 ======= Several AI civilizations flip larger areas on spawn to help them along. >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

TEXT.English: In Dawn of Civilization, free technology effects like the Oracle only allow you to choose technologies of your current or earlier eras.
TEXT.Chinese: In Dawn of Civilization, free technology effects like the Oracle only allow you to choose technologies of your current or earlier eras.

TEXT.English: If you're playing as a Western European civilization, build a Trading Company to expand to Africa or Asia.
TEXT.Chinese: If you're playing as a Western European civilization, build a Trading Company to expand to Africa or Asia.

Civ4GameText.TEXT:
TXT_KEY_HINT_DOC_6 Pagan Temples cannot be built in cities that have a religion, and when a religion spreads to a city with a Pagan Temple, it is replaced by that religion's temple instead.
<<<<<<< HEAD 原始神庙只能建造于没有宗教信仰的城市，当宗教传入时，原始神庙自动变更为该宗教的寺庙。 ======= Pagan Temples cannot be built in cities that have a religion, and when a religion spreads to a city with a Pagan Temple, it is replaced by that religion's temple instead. >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

TEXT.English: In Dawn of Civilization, civilisations can respawn in historically appropriate time periods, even before Nationalism has been discovered.
TEXT.Chinese: In Dawn of Civilization, civilisations can respawn in historically appropriate time periods, even before Nationalism has been discovered.

TEXT.English: You need to discover Exploration before you can vassalize far away civilizations.
TEXT.Chinese: You need to discover Exploration before you can vassalize far away civilizations.

TEXT.English: You need to discover Exploration before you can train settlers on other continents than your capital's.
TEXT.Chinese: You need to discover Exploration before you can train settlers on other continents than your capital's.

TEXT.English: In Dawn of Civilization, military units cannot be killed by the plague, only weakened.
TEXT.Chinese: In Dawn of Civilization, military units cannot be killed by the plague, only weakened.

TEXT.English: Related religions like Hinduism and Buddhism or Confucianism and Taoism don't create unhappiness if one of them is your state religion
TEXT.Chinese: Related religions like Hinduism and Buddhism or Confucianism and Taoism don't create unhappiness if one of them is your state religion

Civ4GameText.TEXT:
TXT_KEY_HINT_DOC_12 The Seljuks appear in the Middle East in the 11th century. Be prepared!
<<<<<<< HEAD 塞尔柱文明将会于十二世纪出现在中东地区，请做好准备！ ======= The Seljuks appear in the Middle East in the 11th century. Be prepared! >>>>>>> 3e61ab415e2a59b842c7d2d7ebee2232404ce96f

TEXT.English: Related religions like Hinduism and Buddhism or Confucianism and Taoism create reduced diplomacy penalties
TEXT.Chinese: Related religions like Hinduism and Buddhism or Confucianism and Taoism create reduced diplomacy penalties

TEXT.English: Corporation headquarters and executives have been removed, corporations spread on their own if the prerequisites are met.
TEXT.Chinese: Corporation headquarters and executives have been removed, corporations spread on their own if the prerequisites are met.

TEXT.English: The Silk Route and Trading Company corporations can only spread in historically appropriate regions.
TEXT.Chinese: The Silk Route and Trading Company corporations can only spread in historically appropriate regions.

TEXT.English: To attract corporations, acquire more of its resources, build associated buildings, or adopt the Free Enterprise civic.
TEXT.Chinese: To attract corporations, acquire more of its resources, build associated buildings, or adopt the Free Enterprise civic.

TEXT.English: In Dawn of Civilization, many wonders have religion or civic prerequisites to encourage their historical distribution.
TEXT.Chinese: In Dawn of Civilization, many wonders have religion or civic prerequisites to encourage their historical distribution.

TEXT.English: Researching Printing as a Catholic civilization starts the Reformation, prompting all Catholic civilizations to decide if they want to convert to Protestantism.
TEXT.Chinese: Researching Printing as a Catholic civilization starts the Reformation, prompting all Catholic civilizations to decide if they want to convert to Protestantism.

TEXT.English: In Dawn of Civilization, vassals do not have to give up tile control their masters in the first ring around their cities.
TEXT.Chinese: In Dawn of Civilization, vassals do not have to give up tile control their masters in the first ring around their cities.

TEXT.English: When a UHV goal asks to control a civilization, you need to own more cities in their core than they do.
TEXT.Chinese: When a UHV goal asks to control a civilization, you need to own more cities in their core than they do.

TEXT.English: Areas that are relevant to your UHV are displayed in light blue in the tile tooltip.
TEXT.Chinese: Areas that are relevant to your UHV are displayed in light blue in the tile tooltip.

TEXT.English: Dawn of Civilization is still actively developed. You can get the latest bugfixes and additions by using the Git version of the mod. Visit the forum under http://forums.civfanatics.com/forumdisplay.php?f=452 to find out how.
TEXT.Chinese: Dawn of Civilization is still actively developed. You can get the latest bugfixes and additions by using the Git version of the mod. Visit the forum under http://forums.civfanatics.com/forumdisplay.php?f=452 to find out how.

TEXT.English: Catholicism is founded by the Great Schism, which occurs when more than half of all Orthodox cities fall outside of the control of Orthodox civilisations.
TEXT.Chinese: Catholicism is founded by the Great Schism, which occurs when more than half of all Orthodox cities fall outside of the control of Orthodox civilisations.

TEXT.English: The amount of cultures that Great Artists can generate using Great Works depends on the game era.
TEXT.Chinese: The amount of cultures that Great Artists can generate using Great Works depends on the game era.

TEXT.English: Train a persecutor to remove non-state religions from your cities.
TEXT.Chinese: Train a persecutor to remove non-state religions from your cities.

TEXT.English: Confused about the expansion and civic stability rules? Look them up under the Concepts section in the Civilopedia!
TEXT.Chinese: Confused about the expansion and civic stability rules? Look them up under the Concepts section in the Civilopedia!

TEXT.English: The soundtracks you hear during the Classical, Medieval and Renaissance eras depend on your state religion.
TEXT.Chinese: The soundtracks you hear during the Classical, Medieval and Renaissance eras depend on your state religion.

TEXT.English: AI Romans and Greeks will receive armies to conquer the Mediterranean and Mesopotamia. Be prepared!
TEXT.Chinese: AI Romans and Greeks will receive armies to conquer the Mediterranean and Mesopotamia. Be prepared!

TEXT.English: Cities on islands of size five or less also act as improvements for the resource they are founded on, yielding the full production and commerce increase for the city tile.
TEXT.Chinese: Cities on islands of size five or less also act as improvements for the resource they are founded on, yielding the full production and commerce increase for the city tile.

TEXT.English: Defeating Native units on your territory while using Slavery has a chance to create a slave unit.
TEXT.Chinese: Defeating Native units on your territory while using Slavery has a chance to create a slave unit.

TEXT.English: Acquire slaves to build slave plantations or settle them in your cities. This option is only available in North America or in Africa unless your capital is in Africa.
TEXT.Chinese: Acquire slaves to build slave plantations or settle them in your cities. This option is only available in North America or in Africa unless your capital is in Africa.

TEXT.English: If you run Slavery or Colonialism, you can trade slaves when interacting with other civilizations in the diplomacy interface.
TEXT.Chinese: If you run Slavery or Colonialism, you can trade slaves when interacting with other civilizations in the diplomacy interface.

TEXT.English: Tribal villages are placed randomly at the beginning of the game.
TEXT.Chinese: Tribal villages are placed randomly at the beginning of the game.

TEXT.English: The area certain civilisations flip on spawn is not always identical to their core. Several civilizations can flip larger areas.
TEXT.Chinese: The area certain civilisations flip on spawn is not always identical to their core. Several civilizations can flip larger areas.

TEXT.English: The core of several civilisations expands on certain conditions, such as entering a new era.
TEXT.Chinese: The core of several civilisations expands on certain conditions, such as entering a new era.

TEXT.English: The stability and flip zone maps for all civilizations can be found in the Maps folder.
TEXT.Chinese: The stability and flip zone maps for all civilizations can be found in the Maps folder.

TEXT.English: The Tamils, Moors, Tibetan, Polish and Congolese civilizations can be configured not to appear in every game. Edit the XML\GlobalDefinesAlt.xml file.
TEXT.Chinese: The Tamils, Moors, Tibetan, Polish and Congolese civilizations can be configured not to appear in every game. Edit the XML\GlobalDefinesAlt.xml file.

TEXT.English: The Polynesian and Harappan civilizations are intended for the human player only. You can enable them for the AI in XML\GlobalDefinesAlt.xml, however their AI will not be geared towards playing successfully or realistically.
TEXT.Chinese: The Polynesian and Harappan civilizations are intended for the human player only. You can enable them for the AI in XML\GlobalDefinesAlt.xml, however their AI will not be geared towards playing successfully or realistically.

TEXT.English: Stability checks can increase or reduce your stability level and in the latter case, lead to crises and even collapse!
TEXT.Chinese: Stability checks can increase or reduce your stability level and in the latter case, lead to crises and even collapse!

TEXT.English: Stability checks are triggered by a variety of events including discovering techs, changing civics and losing or acquiring cities.
TEXT.Chinese: Stability checks are triggered by a variety of events including discovering techs, changing civics and losing or acquiring cities.

TEXT.English: Golden Ages protect you from most negative effects of being unstable. The protection only lasts as long as the Golden Age, however.
TEXT.Chinese: Golden Ages protect you from most negative effects of being unstable. The protection only lasts as long as the Golden Age, however.

TEXT.English: DoC adds a new terrain feature, Rainforests. They resemble Jungles, but cause no unhealthiness and can be improved after the discovery of Bloomery.
TEXT.Chinese: DoC adds a new terrain feature, Rainforests. They resemble Jungles, but cause no unhealthiness and can be improved after the discovery of Bloomery.

TEXT.English: In DoC, Ocean tiles start out yielding no food. Improvements on Ocean tiles require Compass, but in turn provide one additional food.
TEXT.Chinese: In DoC, Ocean tiles start out yielding no food. Improvements on Ocean tiles require Compass, but in turn provide one additional food.

TEXT.English: Islands are a new maritime terrain feature that provides additional production, tile defense and faster culture spread.
TEXT.Chinese: Islands are a new maritime terrain feature that provides additional production, tile defense and faster culture spread.

TEXT.English: Instead of spreading their culture in rings with every new culture level, cities spread cultural control over individual tiles as their culture grows.
TEXT.Chinese: Instead of spreading their culture in rings with every new culture level, cities spread cultural control over individual tiles as their culture grows.

TEXT.English: The amount of culture needed to cover a tile depends on its terrain type and features, as well as the distance to cities.
TEXT.Chinese: The amount of culture needed to cover a tile depends on its terrain type and features, as well as the distance to cities.

TEXT.English: City culture will never expand beyond the third ring.
TEXT.Chinese: City culture will never expand beyond the third ring.

TEXT.English: The amount of culture required for the next tile to be covered is displayed as tick marks on the culture bar in the city screen.
TEXT.Chinese: The amount of culture required for the next tile to be covered is displayed as tick marks on the culture bar in the city screen.

TEXT.English: A purple circle marks the next tile to be culturally covered in the city screen.
TEXT.Chinese: A purple circle marks the next tile to be culturally covered in the city screen.

TEXT.English: A Great Statesman can put an end to war or anarchy, improve diplomatic relations, build an Administrative Center or reform your civics for free.
TEXT.Chinese: A Great Statesman can put an end to war or anarchy, improve diplomatic relations, build an Administrative Center or reform your civics for free.

TEXT.English: Oases provide more food and less commerce. It is also possible to build Cottages on Oases.
TEXT.Chinese: Oases provide more food and less commerce. It is also possible to build Cottages on Oases.

TEXT.English: Spies can now accumulate experience and acquire promotions by successfully completing missions.
TEXT.Chinese: Spies can now accumulate experience and acquire promotions by successfully completing missions.

TEXT.English: Spy specialists have been removed. Instead, global spy experience is accumulated similar to military experience. If the bar is full, your most experienced spy becomes a Great Spy.
TEXT.Chinese: Spy specialists have been removed. Instead, global spy experience is accumulated similar to military experience. If the bar is full, your most experienced spy becomes a Great Spy.

TEXT.English: If you have problems with game performance in the late game, enabling graphics paging in the BUG menu can help on some machines.
TEXT.Chinese: If you have problems with game performance in the late game, enabling graphics paging in the BUG menu can help on some machines.

TEXT.English: Civic combinations with positive or negative effects on stability are highlighted in the civics advisor.
TEXT.Chinese: Civic combinations with positive or negative effects on stability are highlighted in the civics advisor.

TEXT.English: Religions spread gradually from around cities where the religion is already present. The presence of religious buildings increases the spread range.
TEXT.Chinese: Religions spread gradually from around cities where the religion is already present. The presence of religious buildings increases the spread range.

TEXT.English: Religions spread faster in regions where they were historically present. In some regions religions can only spread if they are the state religion of the owner.
TEXT.Chinese: Religions spread faster in regions where they were historically present. In some regions religions can only spread if they are the state religion of the owner.

TEXT.English: There is a chance that an existing religion disappears when a new religion spreads to a city. Religions can also disappear when too many of them are present, especially in smaller cities.
TEXT.Chinese: There is a chance that an existing religion disappears when a new religion spreads to a city. Religions can also disappear when too many of them are present, especially in smaller cities.

TEXT.English: Only proselytizing religions, that is Buddhism, Christianity and Islam, can be spread by missionaries in civilizations with a different state religion.
TEXT.Chinese: Only proselytizing religions, that is Buddhism, Christianity and Islam, can be spread by missionaries in civilizations with a different state religion.

TEXT.English: Dawn of Civilization features a completely new tech tree, consisting of 141 technologies spread over 7 eras.
TEXT.Chinese: Dawn of Civilization features a completely new tech tree, consisting of 141 technologies spread over 7 eras.

TEXT.English: The last two eras are now called the Global and Digital eras.
TEXT.Chinese: The last two eras are now called the Global and Digital eras.

TEXT.English: Siege units are now much more expensive, but their increased withdrawal chance also makes them less expendable.
TEXT.Chinese: Siege units are now much more expensive, but their increased withdrawal chance also makes them less expendable.

TEXT.English: Instead of starting with no religion, each civilisation starts with its own specific pagan religion. These religions do not have any of the benefits of major religions, however.
TEXT.Chinese: Instead of starting with no religion, each civilisation starts with its own specific pagan religion. These religions do not have any of the benefits of major religions, however.

TEXT.English: The presence of non-state religions causes unhappiness in your cities, unless you adopt the Tolerance civic.
TEXT.Chinese: The presence of non-state religions causes unhappiness in your cities, unless you adopt the Tolerance civic.

TEXT.English: Units lose all their promotions when upgraded. A portion of the experience earned is refunded, depending on the strength difference between the previous and current unit type.
TEXT.Chinese: Units lose all their promotions when upgraded. A portion of the experience earned is refunded, depending on the strength difference between the previous and current unit type.

TEXT.English: City defense now also protects against collateral damage: unit strength can never be reduced below the current defense modifier.
TEXT.Chinese: City defense now also protects against collateral damage: unit strength can never be reduced below the current defense modifier.

TEXT.English: Entering enemy waters consumes all remaining movement points.
TEXT.Chinese: Entering enemy waters consumes all remaining movement points.

TEXT.English: Bad health from power is multiplied by the number of buildings that consume power.
TEXT.Chinese: Bad health from power is multiplied by the number of buildings that consume power.

TEXT.English: Enemy workers cannot be captured unless enabled by a civic.
TEXT.Chinese: Enemy workers cannot be captured unless enabled by a civic.

TEXT.English: The number of National Wonders and Great Wonders that can be built in a city is limited by its culture level.
TEXT.Chinese: The number of National Wonders and Great Wonders that can be built in a city is limited by its culture level.

TEXT.English: Many classical wonders can only be built with no state religion in cities without any religions.
TEXT.Chinese: Many classical wonders can only be built with no state religion in cities without any religions.

TEXT.English: Mounted units have been split into Light Cavalry and Heavy Cavalry.
TEXT.Chinese: Mounted units have been split into Light Cavalry and Heavy Cavalry.

TEXT.English: Some units are stronger in open terrain. Tiles that are flat, have no features with defensive bonuses, and do not contain a city or fort count as open terrain.
TEXT.Chinese: Some units are stronger in open terrain. Tiles that are flat, have no features with defensive bonuses, and do not contain a city or fort count as open terrain.

TEXT.English: Invest in culture. Your specialists become more effective with higher culture levels.
TEXT.Chinese: Invest in culture. Your specialists become more effective with higher culture levels.

TEXT.English: In addition to discovering the associated technology, to found a religion you also need to control a city in its historical core region.
TEXT.Chinese: In addition to discovering the associated technology, to found a religion you also need to control a city in its historical core region.
